Html:
I'm having trouble getting the database created for MySQL (I'm using version 5.1) using the standard CLI admin interface. I run "source MySQL.Connector.KiGG.Schema.Raw.Script.sql" and I receive a ton of errors. I haven't seen any other complaints, so I'm guessing it's something I'm doing wrong. Here's the output I get:

 

mysql> source MySQL.Connector.KiGG.Schema.Raw.Script.sql
